i just downloaded 1.1 and when i started the game the window was VERY small. i went into the options menu and tried to put it in full screen and nothing happened when i clicked accept/apply. which also brought up another issue, the window is so small that the menu doesn't fit properly and portions are cut off. is there any way i can make the game window bigger?

Edited April 20, 2016 by MoonPies

Havu tried opening the ksp launcher (in program destination folder), think you can change settings there? Maybe,

worth a go

i changed it manually, got it to the normal size. ty
